title: AllocationFactor

product.description: The output product (or waste input) to which this allocation factor is related. The must be an exchange with this product output (or waste input) in this process.

value.description: The value of the allocation factor.

formula.description: An optional formula from which the value of the allocation factor is calculated.

exchange.description: A product input, waste output, or elementary flow exchange which is allocated by this factor. This is only valid for causal allocation where allocation factors can be assigned to single exchanges.

description: A single allocation factor in a process.
